item.title: Craig David,Sigala - Ain't Giving Up
item.description:
When you’re sober
laugh
Sometimes you gotta
take a chance
To break
through
And when the world is
not enough
That’s
what gives you
Everything
or breaks you
Feeling empty
feeling used
It’s like we’re
running off fumes
A little broken
confused
But one thing
I know for sure
Ain’t giving up on you
ain’t giving up on you

gets tough

and you for life

not enough

the fight
